<a href="https://lunanode.com/">LunaNode</a> is a cloud platform in Toronto. We offer an extensive array of cloud features:

* <b>Hourly Billing</b>: our services are billed hourly! <a href="https://www.lunanode.com/pricing">See pricing here.</a>
* <b>Live Snapshots</b>: whether you use it for templating or backups, snapshots are super convenient. You can take consistent snapshots without even turning off your VM!
* <b>Volumes (Block Storage)</b>: volumes are block devices that can be attached/detached between your VMs, and are stored on a redundant Ceph cluster. Pricing is just $0.03/GB/mo.
* <b>Uptime Monitoring, DNS, E-mail</b>: active customers (used at least $3 credit in the current month) can use our <a href="https://wiki.lunanode.com/index.php/Server_monitoring">uptime monitoring</a>, <a href="https://wiki.lunanode.com/index.php/DNS">DNS</a>, and e-mail platforms for free (with limits on free usage)!

Our pricing is at https://www.lunanode.com/pricing. For example, our m.2 plan comes with:

* 2 GB RAM
* 1 vCPU
* 20 GB SSD storage
* 2 TB bandwidth
* $7/mo ($0.00972/hr)

We are offering $10 free credit for new Canadian/U.S. customers (unused credit expires after 60 days)! No payment is needed, but a credit card validation step is required. To get the free credit:

* Sign up at https://dynamic.lunanode.com/signup
* Go to <a href="https://dynamic.lunanode.com/panel/billing?tab=billing_promotions">Billing -> Promotions</a> and enter promotion code <b>TENFREE</b>
* Follow the instructions to validate your credit card

More info about our infrastructure at https://lunanode.com.
